## Variables

A global Role slice that contains a list of all available AWS IAM roles that an authenticated user has the ability to assume. This is used to be easily passed into a user selection prompt to select a particular role to login.

```go
var Roles []Role
```

## type [CLI](<https://github.com/S7R4nG3/aws-adfs-login/blob/main/types/types.go#L38-L45>)

A generic CLI struct used to contain the CLI flag values and shared logger

```go
type CLI struct {
    Region      string
    Duration    int
    Profile     string
    IdpEntryUrl string
    CABundle    string
    Logger      *logrus.Logger
}
```

A global CLI variable used to contain all the CLI flags so they can be easily passed to other packages for reference/override.

```go
var Cli CLI
```

## type [Role](<https://github.com/S7R4nG3/aws-adfs-login/blob/main/types/types.go#L48-L51>)

A generic Role struct used to contain an AWS IAM role and its principal ARN.

```go
type Role struct {
    Name         string
    PrincipalArn string
}
```

## type [User](<https://github.com/S7R4nG3/aws-adfs-login/blob/main/types/types.go#L31-L35>)

A generic User struct used to contain user login credentials

```go
type User struct {
    Username string
    Password string
    Domain   string
}
```

A global User variable used to contain the user login credentials so they can be provided via CLI flags or via direct user prompts.

```go
var LoginUser User
```
